paragraphs: Local Secrets is the Spanish brand of the Local Secrets group. Founded in 20XX, our company is one of the most dynamic and popular in the European tourism sector. Local Secrets has more than 10 million fans on Facebook and more than 30 million visitors to its platforms every month.
Our success is based primarily on our ability to continuously find and disseminate inspiring and attractive tourism product offers.
But it's also our genuine love of travel that unites and drives us, day after day, to offer our community the travel deals and destinations we dream of ourselves.

We want to keep dreaming, growing and changing the travel industry sustainably with strong partners by our side. We propose to highlight, in various media, the advantages of your brand, your offers and your destinations to our important community of travelers.

testimonials.title: What our travelers say
testimonials.subtitle: Check out what our workers say about the Local Secrets portal. Our goal is to provide the highest quality for all audiences.

items.text: "From the beginning I found Local Secrets super easy to use. Plus I downloaded the app to manage my business from anywhere. Amazing!"
"Simply the best website. I especially recommend it for businesses that are just starting out and don't know how to get noticed"
"Super attentive. They answered all my questions very quickly and my location has had more visits since we've been on Local Secrets. Thank you very much"
